TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OleDbSchemaGuid extends System.Object

summary.span: 返回由 方法指定的架构表类型。

span.span: Returns the type of schema table specified by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类中的每个字段都 映射到一个 OLE DB 架构行集。Each field in the class maps to an OLE DB schema rowset. > [!NOTE] > OLE DB 提供程序可能不支持类的某些成员（如架构）。Some members of the class, (such as schema) may not be supported by your OLE DB provider. 请参阅数据库文档，以确定是否可以通过查询数据库的系统表来检索此架构信息。Refer to your database documentation to determine whether you can retrieve this schema information by querying the system tables of your database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Assertions
Public Shared ReadOnly Assertions As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的给定用户拥有的断言。

span.span: Returns the assertions defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 断言行集。 maps to the OLE DB ASSERTIONS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Catalogs
Public Shared ReadOnly Catalogs As Guid

summary.span: 返回与可从数据源访问的目录有关的物理特性。

span.span: Returns the physical attributes associated with catalogs accessible from the data source.

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的给定用户拥有的断言。

span.span: Returns the assertions defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 目录行集并返回以下限制列。 maps to the OLE DB CATALOGS rowset and returns the following restriction column. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CATALOG_NAMECATALOG_NAME|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 不能为 Null 值。Cannot be a null value.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Character_Sets
Public Shared ReadOnly Character_Sets As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的字符集，给定用户可以访问它们。

span.span: Returns the character sets defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB CHARACTER_SETS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB CHARACTER_SETS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CHARACTER_SET_CATALOGCHARACTER_SET_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CHARACTER_SET_SCHEMACHARACTER_SET_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CHARACTER_SET_NAMECHARACTER_SET_NAME|`string`|字符集名称。Character set name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Check_Constraints
Public Shared ReadOnly Check_Constraints As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的给定用户拥有的 CHECK 约束。

span.span: Returns the check constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Check_Constraints_By_Table
Public Shared ReadOnly Check_Constraints_By_Table As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的给定用户拥有的 CHECK 约束。

span.span: Returns the check constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB CHECK_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Collations
Public Shared ReadOnly Collations As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的字符排序规则，给定用户可以访问它们。

span.span: Returns the character collations defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 排序规则行集。 maps to the OLE DB COLLATIONS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |COLLATION_CATALOGCOLLATION_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |COLLATION_SCHEMACOLLATION_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |COLLATION_NAMECOLLATION_NAME|`string`|排序规则名。Collation name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Column_Domain_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Column_Domain_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义、依赖于在目录中定义的域并由给定用户拥有的列。

span.span: Returns the columns defined in the catalog that are dependent on a domain defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 行集。 maps to the OLE DB COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |DOMAIN_CATALOGDOMAIN_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |DOMAIN_SCHEMADOMAIN_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |DOMAIN_NAMEDOMAIN_NAME|`string`|视图名称。View name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|列名称。Column name. 此列与 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 列一起构成列 ID。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 其中的一个或多个列将为 null 值，具体取决于提供程序使用的 DBID 结构的元素。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses. （DBID 是序列化到 COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 行集的 COLUMN_NAME 列中的正式结构。）(DBID is a formal structure serialized into the COLUMN_NAME column of the COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset.)|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Column_Privileges
Public Shared ReadOnly Column_Privileges As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义、给定用户可使用或负责授予的对表中列的特权。

span.span: Returns the privileges on columns of tables defined in the catalog that are available to or granted by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB COLUMN_PRIVILEGES 行集。 maps to the OLE DB COLUMN_PRIVILEGES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|列名称。Column name. 此列与 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 列一起构成列 ID。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 其中的一个或多个列将为 null 值，具体取决于提供程序使用的 DBID 结构的元素。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses.| |GRANTORGRANTOR|`string`|在 TABLE_NAME 中授予对表的特权的用户。User that granted the privileges on the table in TABLE_NAME.| |GRANTEEGRANTEE|`string`|已授予权限的用户名（或 "公用"）。User name (or "PUBLIC") that the privilege has been granted to.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Columns
Public Shared ReadOnly Columns As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的表（包括视图）的列，给定用户可以访问这些列。

span.span: Returns the columns of tables (including views) defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 列行集。 maps to the OLE DB COLUMNS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name. 返回的列不能包含 null 值。The column returned cannot contain a null value.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|列的名称;这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果这无法确定，则返回 NULL 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此列与 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 列一起构成列 ID。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 其中的一个或多个列将为 null 值，具体取决于提供程序使用的 DBID 结构的元素。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses. （DBID 是序列化到 COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 行集的 COLUMN_NAME 列中的正式结构。）如果可能，则生成的列 ID 应为永久性列 ID。(DBID is a formal structure serialized into the COLUMN_NAME column of the COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset.) If possible, the resulting column ID should be persistent. 但是，某些提供程序不支持列的永久标识符。However, some providers do not support persistent identifiers for columns. 基表的列 ID 在 "视图" 下应该是固定的。The column ID of a base table should be invariant under views.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Constraint_Column_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Constraint_Column_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 返回由引用约束、唯一约束、CHECK 约束和断言使用的、在目录中定义并由给定用户拥有的列。

span.span: Returns the columns used by referential constraints, unique constraints, check constraints, and assertions, defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE 行集。 maps to the OLE DB CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|列名称。Column name. 此列与 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 列一起构成列 ID。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 其中的一个或多个列将为 null 值，具体取决于提供程序使用的 DBID 结构的元素。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses.| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Constraint_Table_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Constraint_Table_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 返回由引用约束、唯一约束、CHECK 约束和在目录中定义并由给定用户拥有的断言使用的表。

span.span: Returns the tables that are used by referential constraints, unique constraints, check constraints, and assertions defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB CONSTRAINT_TABLE_USAGE 行集。 maps to the OLE DB CONSTRAINT_TABLE_USAGE rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid DbInfoKeywords
Public Shared ReadOnly DbInfoKeywords As Guid

summary.span: 返回提供程序特定的关键字的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of provider-specific keywords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 等效于调用 OLE DB IDBInfo：： GetKeywords 接口。Using is equivalent to calling the OLE DB IDBInfo::GetKeywords interface. 关键字列表作为带有名为 "关键字" 的单列的 DataTable 返回。The list of keywords is returned as a DataTable with a single column named "Keyword". 提供程序返回的每个关键字都将位于 DataTable 中各自的行上。Each keyword returned by the provider will be on its own row in the DataTable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid DbInfoLiterals
Public Shared ReadOnly DbInfoLiterals As Guid

summary.span: 返回在文本命令使用的提供程序特定的文本的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of provider-specific literals used in text commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 等效于调用 OLE DB **IDBInfo：： GetLiteralInfo**接口，或使用常数的 ADO `Connection.OpenSchema` 方法 `adSchemaDBInfoLiterals` 。Using is equivalent to calling the OLE DB **IDBInfo::GetLiteralInfo** interface, or the ADO `Connection.OpenSchema` method with the `adSchemaDBInfoLiterals` constant. 使用方法时 ，如果 `schema` 参数包含的值 并且 `restrictions` 参数包含一个或多个限制， 则会生成。When using the method, if the `schema` parameter contains a value of and the `restrictions` parameter contains one or more restrictions, an is generated.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Foreign_Keys
Public Shared ReadOnly Foreign_Keys As Guid

summary.span: 返回由给定用户在目录中定义的外键列。

span.span: Returns the foreign key columns defined in the catalog by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB FOREIGN_KEYS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB FOREIGN_KEYS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PK_TABLE_CATALOGPK_TABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义主键表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the primary key table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PK_TABLE_SCHEMAPK_TABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义主键表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the primary key table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |PK_TABLE_NAMEPK_TABLE_NAME|`string`|主键表名称。Primary key table name.| |FK_TABLE_CATALOGFK_TABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义外键表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the foreign key table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |FK_TABLE_SCHEMAFK_TABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义外键表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the foreign key table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |FK_TABLE_NAMEFK_TABLE_NAME|`string`|外键表名。Foreign key table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Indexes
Public Shared ReadOnly Indexes As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的由给定用户拥有的索引。

span.span: Returns the indexes defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 索引行集。 maps to the OLE DB INDEXES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |INDEX_NAMEINDEX_NAME|`string`|索引名。Index name.| |TYPETYPE|`UInt16 (Int32)`|索引的类型。The type of the index. 以下项之一：One of the following:

DBPROPVAL_IT_BTREE-索引为 B + 树。DBPROPVAL_IT_BTREE-The index is a B+-tree.

DBPROPVAL_IT_HASH-索引是使用的哈希文件，例如，线性或可扩展哈希。DBPROPVAL_IT_HASH-The index is a hash file using, for example, linear or extensible hashing.

DBPROPVAL_IT_CONTENT-索引为内容索引。DBPROPVAL_IT_CONTENT-The index is a content index.

DBPROPVAL_IT_OTHER-索引为某些其他类型的索引。DBPROPVAL_IT_OTHER-The index is some other type of index.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Key_Column_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly Key_Column_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的列，给定用户将这些列约束为键。

span.span: Returns the columns defined in the catalog that is constrained as keys by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB KEY_COLUMN_USAGE 行集。 maps to the OLE DB KEY_COLUMN_USAGE rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义包含键列的表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table containing the key column is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义了包含键列的表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table containing the key column is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|包含键列的表名。Table name containing the key column.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|参与唯一键、主键或外键的列的名称。Name of the column participating in the unique, primary, or foreign key. 此列与 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 列一起构成列 ID。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 其中的一个或多个列将为 null 值，具体取决于提供程序使用的 DBID 结构的元素。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses. （DBID 是序列化到 COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE 行集的 COLUMN_NAME 列中的正式结构。）(DBID is a formal structure serialized into the COLUMN_NAME column of the COLUMN_DOMAIN_USAGE rowset.)|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Primary_Keys
Public Shared ReadOnly Primary_Keys As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中由给定用户定义的主键列。

span.span: Returns the primary key columns defined in the catalog by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB PRIMARY_KEYS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB PRIMARY_KEYS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Procedure_Columns
Public Shared ReadOnly Procedure_Columns As Guid

summary.span: 返回有关由过程返回的行集合的列的信息。

span.span: Returns information about the columns of rowsets returned by procedures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB PROCEDURE_COLUMNS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB PROCEDURE_COLUMNS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PROCEDURE_CATALOGPROCEDURE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_SCHEMAPROCEDURE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |PROCEDURE_NAMEPROCEDURE_NAME|`string`|过程名。Procedure name.| |COLUMN_NAMECOLUMN_NAME|`string`|列的名称;这可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果这无法确定，则返回 NULL 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 此列与 COLUMN_GUID 和 COLUMN_PROPID 列一起构成列 ID。This column, together with the COLUMN_GUID and COLUMN_PROPID columns, forms the column ID. 其中的一个或多个列将为 null 值，具体取决于提供程序使用的 DBID 结构的元素。One or more of these columns will be a null value, depending on which elements of the DBID structure the provider uses.| > [!NOTE] > MDAC 版本2.7 附带的任何 OLE DB 提供程序都不支持该架构。The schema is not supported by any OLE DB providers that ship in MDAC version 2.7. 请参阅数据库文档，以确定是否可以通过查询数据库的系统表来检索此架构信息。Refer to your database documentation to determine whether you can retrieve this schema information by querying the system tables of your database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Procedure_Parameters
Public Shared ReadOnly Procedure_Parameters As Guid

summary.span: 返回有关过程的参数和返回代码的信息。

span.span: Returns information about the parameters and return codes of procedures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB PROCEDURE_PARAMETERS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB PROCEDURE_PARAMETERS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PROCEDURE_CATALOGPROCEDURE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_SCHEMAPROCEDURE_SCHEMA|`string`|架构名称。Schema name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_NAMEPROCEDURE_NAME|`string`|过程名。Procedure name.| |PARAMETER_NAMEPARAMETER_NAME|`string`|参数名。Parameter name. 如果参数未命名，则为 null 值。A null value if the parameter is not named.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Procedures
Public Shared ReadOnly Procedures As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的由给定用户拥有的过程。

span.span: Returns the procedures defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 过程行集。 maps to the OLE DB PROCEDURES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |PROCEDURE_CATALOGPROCEDURE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |PROCEDURE_SCHEMAPROCEDURE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |PROCEDURE_NAMEPROCEDURE_NAME|`string`|过程名。Procedure name.| |PROCEDURE_TYPEPROCEDURE_TYPE|`UInt16`|DB_PT_UNKNOWN-不知道是否有返回值。DB_PT_UNKNOWN-It is not known whether there is a returned value.

DB_PT_PROCEDURE-过程;没有返回值。DB_PT_PROCEDURE-Procedure; there is no returned value.

DB_PT_FUNCTION 函数;有一个返回值。DB_PT_FUNCTION-Function; there is a returned value.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Provider_Types
Public Shared ReadOnly Provider_Types As Guid

summary.span: 返回用于 OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序支持的基本数据类型。

span.span: Returns the base data types supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB PROVIDER_TYPES 行集。 maps to the OLE DB PROVIDER_TYPES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |DATA_TYPEDATA_TYPE|`UInt16 (Int32)`|数据类型的指示符。The indicator of the data type.| |BEST_MATCHBEST_MATCH|`Int16`|VARIANT_TRUE-数据类型是数据存储中所有数据类型与 DATA_TYPE 列中的值指示的 OLE DB 数据类型之间的最佳匹配项。VARIANT_TRUE-The data type is the best match between all data types in the data store and the OLE DB data type indicated by the value in the DATA_TYPE column.

VARIANT_FALSE-数据类型不是最佳匹配项。VARIANT_FALSE-The data type is not the best match. 对于 DATA_TYPE 列的值相同的每组行，BEST_MATCH 列都设置为仅在一行中 VARIANT_TRUE。For each set of rows in which the value of the DATA_TYPE column is the same, the BEST_MATCH column is set to VARIANT_TRUE in only one row.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Referential_Constraints
Public Shared ReadOnly Referential_Constraints As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的由给定用户拥有的引用约束。

span.span: Returns the referential constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB REFERENTIAL_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid SchemaGuids
Public Shared ReadOnly SchemaGuids As Guid

summary.span: 返回架构行集合的列表，该架构行集合是由它们的 GUID 和一个指向限制列的说明的指针标识的。

span.span: Returns a list of schema rowsets, identified by their GUIDs, and a pointer to the descriptions of the restriction columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 等效于调用 OLE DB **IDBSchemaRowset：： GetSchemas**接口。Using is equivalent to calling the OLE DB **IDBSchemaRowset::GetSchemas** interface. 架构和限制的列表以包含两个名为 "架构" 和 "RestrictionSupport" 的列的 DataTable 形式返回。The list of schemas and restrictions are returned as a DataTable with two columns named "Schema" and "RestrictionSupport". 提供程序返回的架构 GUID 和限制位掩码的每个组合都将位于 DataTable 中的行上。Each combination of schema GUID and restriction bitmask returned by the provider will be on its on row in the DataTable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Schemata
Public Shared ReadOnly Schemata As Guid

summary.span: 返回给定用户拥有的架构对象。

span.span: Returns the schema objects that are owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 的 SCHEMATAS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB SCHEMATAS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CATALOG_NAMECATALOG_NAME|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |SCHEMA_NAMESCHEMA_NAME|`string`|非限定的架构名称Unqualified schema name| |SCHEMA_OWNERSCHEMA_OWNER|`string`|拥有架构的用户。User that owns the schemas.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Sql_Languages
Public Shared ReadOnly Sql_Languages As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的 SQL 实现处理数据所支持的一致性级别、选项和语言。

span.span: Returns the conformance levels, options, and dialects supported by the SQL-implementation processing data defined in the catalog.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB SQL_LANGUAGES 行集。 maps to the OLE DB SQL_LANGUAGES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |SQL_LANGUAGE_SOURCESQL_LANGUAGE_SOURCE|`string`|标准 SQL 的 "ISO 9075"。"ISO 9075" for standard SQL.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_YEARSQL_LANGUAGE_YEAR|`string`|与 ANSI SQL-92 兼容的 SQL 的 "1992"。"1992" for ANSI SQL-92-compliant SQL.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_CONFORMANCESQL_LANGUAGE_CONFORMANCE|`string`|以下项之一： "ENTRY"、"中间" 或 "FULL"。One of the following: "ENTRY", "INTERMEDIATE", or "FULL".| |SQL_LANGUAGE_INTEGRITYSQL_LANGUAGE_INTEGRITY|`string`|"是" = 支持可选的完整性功能。"YES"= Optional integrity feature is supported.

"否" = 不支持可选的完整性功能。"NO"=Optional integrity feature is not supported.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_IMPLEMENTATIONSQL_LANGUAGE_IMPLEMENTATION|`string`|对于 "ISO 9075" 实现，为 NULL。NULL for "ISO 9075" implementation.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_BINDING_STYLESQL_LANGUAGE_BINDING_STYLE|`string`|用于 C/c + + 可调用的 SQL 的直接执行。"DIRECT" for C/C++ callable direct execution of SQL.| |SQL_LANGUAGE_PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGESQL_LANGUAGE_PROGRAMMING_LANGUAGE|`string`|NULL。NULL.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Statistics
Public Shared ReadOnly Statistics As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的由给定用户拥有的统计。

span.span: Returns the statistics defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 统计信息行集。 maps to the OLE DB STATISTICS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Table_Constraints
Public Shared ReadOnly Table_Constraints As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的由给定用户拥有的表约束。

span.span: Returns the table constraints defined in the catalog that is owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB TABLE_CONSTRAINTS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLE_CONSTRAINTS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |CONSTRAINT_CATALOGCONSTRAINT_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |CONSTRAINT_SCHEMACONSTRAINT_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |CONSTRAINT_NAMECONSTRAINT_NAME|`string`|约束名称。Constraint name.| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.| |CONSTRAINT_TYPECONSTRAINT_TYPE|`string`|约束类型。Constraint type. 以下项之一： UNIQUE、PRIMARY KEY、FOREIGN KEY 或 CHECK。One of the following: UNIQUE, PRIMARY KEY, FOREIGN KEY, or CHECK.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Table_Privileges
Public Shared ReadOnly Table_Privileges As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义、给定用户可使用或负责授予的对表的特权。

span.span: Returns the privileges on tables defined in the catalog that are available to, or granted by, a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB TABLE_PRIVILEGES 行集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLE_PRIVILEGES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|定义表的目录名称。Catalog name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|定义表的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the table is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.| |GRANTORGRANTOR|`string`|在 TABLE_NAME 中授予对表的特权的用户。User that granted the privileges on the table in TABLE_NAME.| |GRANTEEGRANTEE|`string`|已授予权限的用户名（或 "公用"）。User name (or "PUBLIC") that the privilege has been granted to.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Table_Statistics
Public Shared ReadOnly Table_Statistics As Guid

summary.span: 描述提供程序中表的可用统计集合。

span.span: Describes the available set of statistics on tables in the provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB TABLE_STATISTICS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLE_STATISTICS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|此统计信息的表的目录名称。Catalog name of the table of this statistic. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|表的架构名称。Schema name of the table. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.| |STATISTICS_CATALOGSTATISTICS_CATALOG|`string`|统计信息的目录名称。Catalog name of the statistic. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |STATISTICS_SCHEMASTATISTICS_SCHEMA|`string`|统计信息的架构名称。Schema name of the statistic. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |STATISTICS_NAMESTATISTICS_NAME|`string`|统计信息的名称。Name of the statistic.| |STATISTICS_TYPESTATISTICS_TYPE|`UInt16 (Int32)`|指定此统计支持的统计信息类型的位掩码：Bitmask specifying the kinds of statistics supported by this statistic:

DBSTAT_HISTOGRAM-表示直方图支持。DBSTAT_HISTOGRAM - Indicates histogram support.

DBSTAT_COLUMN_CARDINALITY-指示列基数支持。DBSTAT_COLUMN_CARDINALITY - Indicates column cardinality support.

DBSTAT_TUPLE_CARDINALITY-表示元组基数支持。DBSTAT_TUPLE_CARDINALITY - Indicates tuple cardinality support.

`Note:`直方图只对应于多列统计信息的第一列。`Note:` Histograms correspond to only the first column for a multi-column statistic.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Tables
Public Shared ReadOnly Tables As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的表（包括视图），给定用户可以访问它们。

span.span: Returns the tables (including views) defined in the catalog that are accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 表行集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name. 返回的列不能包含 null 值。The column returned cannot contain a null value.| |TABLE_TYPETABLE_TYPE|`string`|表类型。Table type. 以下或特定于提供程序的值之一： "ALIAS"、"表"、"同义词"、"系统表"、"视图"、"全局临时"、"本地临时" 或 "系统视图"。One of the following or a provider-specific value: "ALIAS", "TABLE" "SYNONYM", "SYSTEM TABLE", "VIEW", "GLOBAL TEMPORARY", "LOCAL TEMPORARY", or "SYSTEM VIEW". 返回的列不能包含 null 值。The column returned cannot contain a null value.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Tables_Info
Public Shared ReadOnly Tables_Info As Guid

summary.span: 返回给定用户可访问的表（包括视图）。

span.span: Returns the tables (including views) that are accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB TABLES_INFO 行集。 maps to the OLE DB TABLES_INFO rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_TYPETABLE_TYPE|`string`|表类型。Table type. 以下或特定于提供程序的值之一： ALIAS、TABLE、同义词、系统表、视图、全局临时、本地临时、外部表或系统视图。One of the following or a provider-specific value: ALIAS, TABLE, SYNONYM, SYSTEM TABLE, VIEW, GLOBAL TEMPORARY, LOCAL TEMPORARY, EXTERNAL TABLE, or SYSTEM VIEW.| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|表名。Table name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Translations
Public Shared ReadOnly Translations As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的字符转换，给定用户可以访问这些字符转换。

span.span: Returns the character translations defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 翻译行集。 maps to the OLE DB TRANSLATIONS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TRANSLATION_CATALOGTRANSLATION_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TRANSLATION_SCHEMATRANSLATION_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TRANSLATION_NAMETRANSLATION_NAME|`string`|翻译名称。Translation name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Trustee
Public Shared ReadOnly Trustee As Guid

summary.span: 标识在数据源中定义的受信者。

span.span: Identifies the trustees defined in the data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB 的受信者架构。 maps to the OLE DB TRUSTEE schema. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TRUSTEE_NAMETRUSTEE_NAME|`string`|受信者名称。Trustee name.| |TRUSTEE_GUIDTRUSTEE_GUID|`guid`|唯一标识受信者的 GUID。GUID that uniquely identifies the trustee. 不使用 Guid 来标识受信者的提供程序应在此列中返回 null 值。Providers that do no use GUIDs to identify trustees should return a null value in this column.| |TRUSTEE_PROPIDTRUSTEE_PROPID|`UInt32 (Int64)`|唯一标识受信者的 PropID。PropID that uniquely identifies the trustee. 不使用 PropIDs 来标识受信者的访问接口应在此列中返回 null 值。Providers that do not use PropIDs to identify trustees should return a null value in this column.| |TRUSTEE_TYPETRUSTEE_TYPE|`UInt32 (Int64)`|受信者类型。Trustee type. 以下项之一：One of the following:

TRUSTEE_IS_UNKNOWN-受信者是未知类型，但不一定是无效类型。TRUSTEE_IS_UNKNOWN - The trustee is an unknown type, but not necessarily an invalid type.

TRUSTEE_IS_USER-受信者帐户是用户帐户。TRUSTEE_IS_USER - The trustee account is a user account.

TRUSTEE_IS_GROUP-受信者是组帐户。TRUSTEE_IS_GROUP - The trustee is a group account.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Usage_Privileges
Public Shared ReadOnly Usage_Privileges As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义、给定用户可使用或负责授予的对对象的 USAGE 特权。

span.span: Returns the USAGE privileges on objects defined in the catalog that are available to or granted by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB USAGE_PRIVILEGES 行集。 maps to the OLE DB USAGE_PRIVILEGES rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |OBJECT_CATALOGOBJECT_CATALOG|`string`|定义对象的目录名称。Catalog name in which the object is defined. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |OBJECT_SCHEMAOBJECT_SCHEMA|`string`|定义对象的非限定架构名称。Unqualified schema name in which the object is defined. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |OBJECT_NAMEOBJECT_NAME|`string`|对象名称。Object name.| |OBJECT_TYPEOBJECT_TYPE|`string`|对象类型。Object type. 以下项之一：域、字符集、排序规则或转换。One of the following: DOMAIN, CHARACTER SET, COLLATION, or TRANSLATION.| |GRANTORGRANTOR|`string`|对 OBJECT_NAME 中的对象授予权限的用户。User that granted the privileges on the object in OBJECT_NAME.| |GRANTEEGRANTEE|`string`|已授予权限的用户名（或 "公用"）。User name (or "PUBLIC") that the privilege has been granted to.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid View_Column_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly View_Column_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 返回已查看的表所依赖、在目录中定义并由给定用户拥有的列。

span.span: Returns the columns on which viewed tables depend, as defined in the catalog and owned by a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB VIEW_COLUMN_USAGE 行集。 maps to the OLE DB VIEW_COLUMN_USAGE rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |VIEW_CATALOGVIEW_CATALOG|stringstring|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |VIEW_SCHEMAVIEW_SCHEMA|stringstring|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |VIEW_NAMEVIEW_NAME|stringstring|视图名称。View name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid View_Table_Usage
Public Shared ReadOnly View_Table_Usage As Guid

summary.span: 返回已查看的表所依赖、在目录中定义并由给定用户拥有的表。

span.span: Returns the tables on which viewed tables, defined in the catalog and owned by a given user, are dependent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB VIEW_TABLE_USAGE 行集。 maps to the OLE DB VIEW_TABLE_USAGE rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |VIEW_CATALOGVIEW_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |VIEW_SCHEMAVIEW_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |VIEW_NAMEVIEW_NAME|`string`|视图名称。View name.|

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid Views
Public Shared ReadOnly Views As Guid

summary.span: 返回在目录中定义的视图，给定用户可以访问这些视图。

span.span: Returns the views defined in the catalog that is accessible to a given user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到 OLE DB VIEWS 行集。 maps to the OLE DB VIEWS rowset. 除非另外指定，否则将按以下顺序返回限制列。Unless otherwise specified, restriction columns are returned in the following order. |限制列Restriction column|CLR 数据类型CLR data type|描述Description| |------------------------|-------------------|-----------------| |TABLE_CATALOGTABLE_CATALOG|`string`|目录名称。Catalog name. 如果提供程序不支持目录，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support catalogs.| |TABLE_SCHEMATABLE_SCHEMA|`string`|非限定的架构名称。Unqualified schema name. 如果提供程序不支持架构，则为 null 值。A null value if the provider does not support schemas.| |TABLE_NAMETABLE_NAME|`string`|视图名称。View name.|
